forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning then remaining overcast and windy during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early then continued cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 44F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening then fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later at night. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
